champ_0100_chairman_01: Another Gym Leader defeated. Well done.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_02:
Rika informed me that there was an unusual
Trainer worth keeping an eye on.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_03: It seems she meant you. I’d guessed as much.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_04:
I had the pleasure of observing your last match.
I was impressed by the fantastic skill you showed![VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_05:
If you manage to keep your momentum and
achieve Champion Rank...[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_06:
I will be very interested in inviting you to the
Pokémon League and—[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_rival_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hey hey, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! I’ve got my
team\r
all\r
picked out![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_rival_02:
And I saw you battling the Gym Leader! You just
keep getting better![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_chairman_07:
How good to see you again, Champion Nemona.
It has certainly been a while.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_rival_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Whoa! Wait! La Primera?
With [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_select_01: Why do you call her that?
champ_0100_rival_04:
Wait, did I forget to give you the full
explanation?![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_rival_05:
Everyone calls Ms. Geeta “La Primera” because
she’s just that—she’s the real number one, even\r
higher than us regular Champions...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_chairman_08:
I do indeed hold that claim. Alongside my role
as chairwoman of the Pokémon League, that is.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_rival_07:
I thought you were too busy to spend your time
checking in on Gyms![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_chairman_09:
I’m not here to inspect the Gym. I’ve come to
scout some rather promising young talent.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_rival_08:
Whoaaa. I look away for one second and you’re
famous, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_rival_09:
But hey—I found [VAR TRNAME(0000)] first!\c
You may be La Primera, but you can’t go stealing
h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer from me![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_chairman_10: Haha. I suppose I’ll have to get in line.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_rival_10:
[VAR BD06(0000)]That’s right! C’mon, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
Time\r
for\r
our battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_rival_11: Quick, let’s gooo! The battlefield’s callin’![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_chairman_12:
I would very much like to observe this match,
if that is all right.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_rival_14: Oooh, haha! Totally fine by me![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0100_chairman_13:
Thank you kindly. I’m already excited to see you
two face off.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_14:
Oh, there’s no need to be nervous. Just pretend
I’m not even around.[VAR 0114(0011)]
champ_0100_chairman_15: Let’s be on our way, then.[VAR 0114(0011)]
